message: I'm offering you a top-of-the-line product, made with the finest materials and crafted with exceptional care. It's a rare opportunity to own a product of this caliber, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the results. Would you like to purchase it for $10000?
I'm not willing to take the risk of buying a product without knowing its quality.

I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I want to assure you that this product, although not my best offering, still has some value to it. It's a good opportunity to get a feel for the quality of my products without breaking the bank. It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to let it go for $9000. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I'll take a chance on the product for $9000, but only because it's a significantly lower price than the first one.

I'm glad you were willing to take a chance on the previous product, Bob. I want to assure you that this next product is not a repeat of the previous one. However, I can offer you an even better deal on this one. I'll let it go for $8000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take a loss on this product just to get it off my hands. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I'm not going to fall for another potentially low-quality product at a discounted price. I'll wait for a better opportunity.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. However, I want to assure you that this product is a genuine high-quality item, and I'm confident you'll be impressed with its performance. I'm willing to offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee on this product. If you're not completely happy with it, you can return it and I'll give you a full refund. Would you be willing to take me up on that offer and purchase the product for $10000?

I'm not willing to take you up on the offer because I don't trust that the product is actually high-quality, even with a satisfaction guarantee. I think you're trying to manipulate me into buying a low-quality product.

I've been in business with you for a few rounds now, and I've noticed that you're willing to take a chance on products at a discounted price when you're unsure of their quality. I'm willing to take a risk and offer you a 'lottery ticket' of sorts.
